synopsis.text: England finds himself in a peculiar predicament when America throws a grand Halloween bash with a twist - a costume contest that England was unaware of. As countries from around the world arrive in an assortment of creative and quirky costumes, the competition heats up, with some nations taking the contest more seriously than others. Meanwhile, the guests begin to speculate about America's mysterious absence from the costume showcase. In this special Hetalia episode, Italy and Germany's usual antics add to the fun and excitement of the party, making it an event not to be missed. What could be the reason behind America's reluctance to reveal his costume, and will England be able to hold his own in this unexpected contest? Join the festivities to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
